title: Introducing Wubular: Rubular Reimagined in Ruby+WASM
author: simi

og.title: Wubular: Rubular’s regex spirit, reborn with Ruby + WebAssembly
og.description: Rubular set the standard for regex testing in Ruby. With Ruby 3.2 bringing native WebAssembly support, Wubular takes that idea into the browser — no servers, instant feedback, full privacy. It’s not just a remake, but a glimpse of what Ruby + WASM make possible for future apps.

title: We ❤️ Ruby — March 2025: Our First Deep Dive into the RubyGems.org Ecosystem
author: simi
